remarks: Definition of 'and' in terms of negation and implication, for decidable propositions.  The forward direction holds for all propositions, and can (basically) be found at ~ pm3.2im .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 30-Apr-2018.)
statement: dfandc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( ( ph /\ ps ) <-> -. ( ph -> -. ps ) ) ) ) $.
